hero.title: Ensure You Are Always Audit-Ready and On Time
hero.subtitle: Saras offers a centralized, intelligent system to track, manage, and report on all regulatory, tax, and legal obligations—so you never miss a deadline, filing, or requirement.

features.title: A Framework for Total Compliance
features.subtitle: Designed to replace fragmented tools and manual reminders with a single source of truth for compliance.

items.title: Intelligent Compliance Calendar
items.description: Visualize all your due dates, filing timelines, renewals, and inspection cycles in one place. Get automated reminders and escalation alerts well in advance—customized for your jurisdiction, industry, and entity structure.

items.title: Maker-Checker Workflow
items.description: Every compliance task—whether it's a tax filing, regulatory submission, or board resolution—is routed through a controlled Maker-Checker flow. Assign, prepare, verify, and approve in a fully auditable process to avoid lapses and unauthorized submissions.

items.title: HOD & Leadership Oversight
items.description: Empower heads of departments, CFOs, and compliance officers with real-time dashboards that show which obligations are complete, pending, overdue, or at risk—segmented by team, region, and entity.

items.title: Attachment & Evidence Management
items.description: Link filings, certificates, challans, correspondence, and supporting documents directly to the task. Never scramble for audit evidence again—everything is structured, time-stamped, and accessible.

items.title: Preloaded Compliance Libraries
items.description: Access ready-made compliance checklists and timelines for Indian corporate, tax, labor, and secretarial laws. Customize and assign them across entities to ensure you’re never building from scratch.

detailSection.title: Enhance Accountability and Reduce Risk
detailSection.description: At the core of Saras Compliance lies the Maker-Checker flow—every task is created by a responsible team member, verified by an internal reviewer, and approved before final execution. Combined with deadline alerts, escalations, and traceable evidence, this ensures full accountability and compliance continuity across departments, even when teams change or grow.

cta.title: Go Beyond Checklists. Achieve True Compliance.
cta.subtitle: Say goodbye to Excel trackers, missed filings, and scattered responsibility. Saras delivers a unified system that enforces deadlines, clarifies ownership, and ensures nothing falls through the cracks.
